reason: Macroeconomic headwinds (Trump trade threats, bond selloff) are fueling a risk-off sentiment across the crypto market, evident in significant altcoin price drops (ETH, SOL, ADA, DOGE). While Bitcoin is attempting a rebound towards $90,000, it faces immediate resistance at this level, and the overall market struggles and uncertainty suggest a cautious stance.
headlines: Bitcoin stages rebound to nearly $90,000 as traders await Trump’s Davos talks
Zcash Foundation adds new Rust DNS seeder to improve network reliability
Rolex, Patek lead high-end watch market rebound even as bitcoin struggles
Dogecoin falls 5% to 12 cents as price breaks down below technical resistance
ETH, SOL, ADA drop 5% as Trump trade threats and bond selloff spark crypto risk-off
